translation.keyAccountDescription: A string (e.g., the Permit Environment or Project key) to act as the account under which this will be saved in the machine's secure key-chain.
translation.useApiKeyDescription: Use API key instead of user authentication.
translation.useWorkspaceDescription: Use a predefined workspace to log in.
translation.loggedInMessage: Logged in to {{organization}} with the selected environment as {{environment}}.

copy.apiKeyDescription: API Key to be used for the environment copy operation (should be at least a project-level key).
copy.fromDescription: Optional: Set the environment ID to copy from. If not set, the CLI will prompt you to select one.
copy.nameDescription: Optional: The environment name to copy to. If not set, the CLI will ask you for one.
copy.descriptionDescription: Optional: The new environment description. If not set, the CLI will ask you for it.
copy.toDescription: Optional: Copy the environment to an existing environment. If this variable is set, the 'name' and 'description' variables will be ignored.
copy.conflictStrategyDescription: Optional: Set the environment conflict strategy. If not set, the default will be 'fail'.

member.apiKeyDescription: An API key to perform the invite. A project or organization-level API key is required to invite members to the account.
member.environmentDescription: Optional: ID of the environment you want to add a member to. If not set, the CLI will prompt you to select one.
member.projectDescription: Optional: ID of the project you want to add a member to.
member.emailDescription: Optional: Email address of the user you want to invite. If not set, the CLI will ask you for it.
member.roleDescription: Optional: The role of the user.

select.apiKeyDescription: Optional: API Key to be used for the environment selection. If not provided, the CLI will redirect you to the login page.

github.apiKeyDescription: The API key for the Permit Environment Organization or Project.
github.inactiveDescription: Do not activate the repository when validated.

policy.apiKeyDescription: The API key for the OPA Server and Permit environment, project, or workspace.
policy.keyAccountDescription: A string (e.g., the Permit Environment or Project key) to act as the account under which this will be saved in the machine's secure key-chain.

check.userAttributesDescription: User attributes in the format key1:value1,key2:value2 (Optional).
check.resourceAttributesDescription: Resource attributes in the format key1:value1,key2:value2 (Optional).
check.actionDescription: Action being performed on the resource by the user (Required).
check.tenantDescription: The tenant the resource belongs to (Optional, defaults to 'default').
check.pdpurlDescription: The URL of the PDP service. Defaults to the cloud PDP. (Optional).
check.apiKeyDescription: The API key for the Permit environment, project, or workspace (Optional).
check.keyAccountDescription: A string (e.g., the Permit Environment or Project key) to act as the account under which this will be saved in the machine's secure key-chain.

run.opaKeyDescription: Expose OPA port from the PDP.
